sentences.en: Aren't most Chinese sensitive to undigested lactose?
sentences.cn: 难道大多数中国人不是乳糖不耐受的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Cow's milk contains about 4.7 % lactose.
sentences.cn: 牛奶含有大约4.7%的乳糖.

sentences.en: In the yogurt lactose decomposes by the lactobacillus, does not have this problem.
sentences.cn: 酸奶中的乳糖被乳酸菌分解掉了, 不存在这个问题.

sentences.en: It is benefited to the person who suffered from lactose intolerance, diabetes, obe.
sentences.cn: 给广大消费者,尤其是乳糖不耐受 、 糖尿病 、 肥胖者带来口福.

sentences.en: Lactose a naturally occurring sugar found in milk.
sentences.cn: 乳糖是牛奶中的天然糖分.

sentences.en: Lactose fermentation is used to verify the existence of coliform bacteria in national criteria.
sentences.cn: 大肠菌群的国标检验法采用乳糖发酵法.

sentences.en: Lactose free: Breaks down sugar molecules to ease digestion . Not reduced - calorie or low - fat.
sentences.cn: 含乳糖:分 解糖分子有助消化. 低热量、低脂肪.

sentences.en: Lactose gives glucose and galactose.
sentences.cn: 乳糖产生葡萄糖和半乳糖.

sentences.en: Lactose is the main carbohydrate occurring in milk.
sentences.cn: 乳糖是乳的主要碳水化合物.

sentences.en: Nutritionally complete, lactose and sucrose free formula.
sentences.cn: 本品为不含乳糖及蔗糖的完全营养豆奶配方.

sentences.en: Objective To approach the effect of lactose free feeding on infants with rotavirus gastroenteritis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨去乳糖饮食佐治小儿轮状病毒肠炎的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To prepare lactose and starch co - processed compound for direct compression.
sentences.cn: 目的制备乳糖-淀粉复合辅料,用于直接压片技术.

sentences.en: Readily digestible carbohydrates ( such as lactose ) are essential to provide energy.
sentences.cn: 易消化碳水化合物 ( 乳糖 ) 是提供仔猪能量所必须的.

sentences.en: Solids - not - fat therefore includes the protein, lactose, minerals, vitamins and minor nitrogenous compounds in milk.
sentences.cn: 因此 非 脂乳固体包括:蛋白质 、 乳糖 、 矿物质 、 维生素和少量的非蛋白氮族化合物.

sentences.en: Some people have trouble digesting lactose, a carbohydrate in milk and milk products, because of the deficiency of enzyme lactase in the body.
sentences.cn: 有些人无法消化乳糖，一种在牛奶和奶制品中的碳水化合物，这是因为在他们的身体中缺少乳糖消化酶。

sentences.en: Somewhat less than 40% of people in the world retain the ability to digest lactose after childhood.
sentences.cn: 全世界大约不到40%的成年人能够在童年过后保留消化乳糖的能力。

sentences.en: The product is a preparation for improving lactose intolerance.
sentences.cn: 本品是一种改善乳糖不耐症的制剂.

sentences.en: Though children were able to drink milk, they typically developed lactose intolerance as they grew up.
sentences.cn: 虽然小孩喝牛奶没有问题，但在长大后他们通常都会产生乳糖不耐受。

sentences.en: To promote the production and consumption of milk, it is necessary to produce and popularize low lactose milk.
sentences.cn: 为了实现人们“想喝奶和多喝奶”的愿望，进行低乳糖奶的生产和推广成为必然。

sentences.en: With sugar malabsorption, intestinal mucosal enzymes, such as lactase, which splits lactose to galactose and glucose, may be congenitally absent or temporarily deficient secondary to GI infection.
sentences.cn: 糖吸收不良：小肠粘膜酶，如乳糖酶能将乳糖分解成半乳糖和葡萄糖，可能是先天缺失或因胃肠感染引起暂时不足。

trans.tran_en: a type of sugar found in milk, sometimes used as a food for babies and sick people
